object.field: Where Nestor waits for the effects of the test batch on their asian consumers.

Sparrow, a long time ago supported Fenris to be the Alpha in the Heart of battle. He had the last vote, and thanks to him Falcon and Father Thunder were beaten. Fenris kept is promise and welcomed the small bird in his brood. But no get of Fenris pack even dared asking the small bird for animal token. Now, no one even knows that Sparrow is from the brood of Fenris.

During a battle in human form, there are great chances against the Sabbat that there will be casualties among the players. This scene is to be played after Krieg has been mortally wounded. He is lying incapacited in a coridor, his back against the wall, barely conscious and pressing his chest wound. Let the player think he is going to die. After a while, he woke up still in the same condition. He might think that it's his last breath. He is now in the Umbra and time has stopped. A small bird has come to see him, eating a few grains of rice on the floor. After what seems to be an eternity, the chirping of the bird become understandable speech. He ask Krieg if his mission is over. If he has reached his purpose in life. If not (probably not), the small bird declares that he is a great warrior among the brood of mighty warriors, but that he neither has reached his purpose in life, obtaining full membership of the brood of Fenris by being supported by one of his children. As he sees their mutual benefices, sparrows make a proposal: let's have both of them a chance to fulfill their destiny.
Sparrow becomes an **Ally (1)** of the character that a earns a **Fetish (3)** background as well.

Krieg japanese bow will be turned into a fetish by sparrow. This fetish is hidden as a tatoo on the heart on all forms. By passing a gnosis check, the sparrow bow reveals itself (automatically in the Umbra). It's a normal bow that needs arrows to be fired. However, by succeeding a gnosis roll (DV 6), it's possible with this bow to fire a mystic arrow. If the number of success indicate the quality of the hit. A mystical arrow, built from the being of Gaia will endure no obstacle between itself and the Wyrm. Arrows fired with the Sparrow bow do aggravated damage.

Introducing Sarah, a would be artist and more escort that could slowly fall into drugs. She’s here with a friend of hers, Arjan Kötter, that came here happy to buy the latest BMW M8 Gran Coupé. Arjan is not exactly a friend. Some would say a VIP client. Anyway the guy has a lot of money and his a gentleman. Sarah thinks that it is a nice deal to balance his clumsiness with girls (he surely never read the documentation) with her clumsiness in life. They directly came from Rotterdam with his Porsche (not a car suited to please the peaceful traveller looking for pretty vistas) and have plan to enjoy a suite at the Marriot (with two rooms). She went only once in Munich, a long time ago with a small sister that is now a model in Los Angeles, and she really remembers how she fell in love with the city. Perhaps there she will finally try to paint… an impossible deed where she comes from as she always supposed to be the model… Bavarian air seems to be such a relief compared to the night life of Amsterdam.

While Arjan is dealing with delivery of his new car, Sarah goes to the Pinakotheka to see the expo. Inside the expo is a central room that can only be reached through the Umbra. This room is the consequence of the actions of Century the Marauder.
A garou will automatically step sideways by reaching the glass walls around the room. In the penumbra, all spirits will stay hidden to watch the actions of whoever enter the room. Before arriving to the pinakotheka, Sarah and Arjan will witness a terrible storm that will last a few minutes. The storm is closely centered around the Pinakotheka, but it is not easy to realize that (Wits+Science). This is the mundane consequence of what just happened in the Umbra.

This place is the result of the victory of Century the Marauder against the Epsilon Mechanoid. When the High Wizard destoyed the Iteration, it fell into pieces, quickly melting into the environment. The quintessence flow was absorbed by the place in the Umbra, thus strenghtening all spirits in slumber. Among them, Brunhilde came up to life and called for an immediate meeting of her court.

In the center of the Pinakotheka, the gauntlet strength is 0 and will come back to 3 at the rate of 1 per moon cycle.The sleepers around are feeling some comfort around and will probably will be more present for the next couple of months.

As only Gaian spirits where presents during the event, only Brunhilde and her court were strengthened by the battle, and thus spirits of the weaver and the wyrm are only lurking from some distance.

*Brunhilde* can only be seen by awaken spirits:
* Garous/Kinfolks with gnosis score. * Kindreds with Auspex 3. * Mage with Spirit/Arete 1.

Introducing Krieg, a native of former East Germany from Berlin. He still has the mark of something that touched more his parents than himself and cannot help himself than to survive from petty illegal activities, involving drugs and occasionally weapons deals instead of choosing for a decent job. Absolutely not a bad guy, more the kind of punk that let his seat to the old ladies in the morning and run away from cops at night. Krieg went to Oktoberfest this year to catch up with his best friend, Josef Tilmann. They didn’t see each other from a long time, especially since Josef went to the United States to study with computers. Krieg doens’t understand exactly what his friend does, but he knows that each time, it’s some kind of magic. And the kind of magic Jo gets from Krieg, it’s when it’s about the ladies. In that field, his friend is the master. That’s going to be nice to catch up again ! An it will be nice to crouch at Bergit and Franz mansion (Jo’s parents) like fifteen years ago. Except this time Krieg did bring a crate of Chateau Cheval Blanc instead of stealing schnaps.
##### The view from Otto _People disappear more often than we use to think. The governments cannot tell everything._

##### Ties During that evening, there are many opportunities for the characters to strengthen their ties.
* **Niklas** and the lost wallet found by **Vidar** and talking about the university * **Sarah** mistaken for **Anneke** by **Brunhilde** * **Arjan** and **Jo** talking on business * **Marcy** hitting on **Krieg** for **Anneke** * **Krieg** and **Niklas** talking about Berlin * **Terry** and **Rina** talking about medical jobs * **Marcy** praising **Sarah** on her magnetism * **Vidar** and **Anneke** talking about becoming an entrepreneur

Munich, Septembre 21st 2019. St Paul area has been completely transformed to host Oktoberfest once again. The site is flooded with people and the city of München becomes once again for a few weeks the high place of fest and beer revelery.
A waitress did not checked in this morning.
The main reward is the ability to become full members of the garoun nation for the players.

Introducing Anneke, a future The Voice idol, ready to participate in Oktober to the German edition of the show. She has come to Oktoberfest with her dear friend Marcia Donorf. Anneke seriously leaks self-confidance, and it’s because of her friend, twenty years older than her and bearing some kind of super-sister-aunty vibe that she went so far in this TV show challenge. Munich will be for them a deserved break. But in reality Anneke doesn’t care that much. She knows it’s going to be a terrible challenge, but deep inside of her she once again feels that this is not what she is supposed to do. Sometimes, she even thinks that at 34 a music career might not be what she is supposed to do with a life. Anyway, she doesn’t know why, she follows the advice of Marcia most of the time. Divorced three times, no children at 52, living from three part time jobs and has astrologist/therapist, the tall blonde has always been for Anneke a figure of wisdom.

A spirit of the court of Bavaria is manifesting around the the Bavaria Statue. During at Bavaria statue, one of the Anneke realize there is a young boy, around 5-6 years old, playing alone with pebbles around the statue. The child seems happy, quietly stacking pebbles on the ground. If asked about his mother, he simply states without looking back at the person who asked "she's coming back soon, she had something to do quickly".

The boy can only be seen by awaken spirits:
* Garous/Kinfolks with gnosis score. * Kindreds with Auspex 3. * Mage with Spirit/Arete 1.

Introducing Niklas, an Austrian fluid mechanics engineer that comes for the first time to the festival with his girlfriend Terri Brandt, a young doctor. They just moved to Munich in August with is fiancée, and after all those changes they decided to enjoy Oktoberfest 2019 before the start of their respective jobs in october. Current projects for Niklas is to found a family, and moving to Munich was the first step in the schedule, now that he will teach at the Munich University and Terri will join the team of a famous cardiovascular surgeon, Professor Lange.

During the Wiesn parade, *Niklas* witness *Brunhilde*, apparently really sad on the horse instead of the real woman riding (*Viktoria Ostler*). Her costume seems washed and teared apart
She makes an unexpected sign to him, some I'm watching you taunt, which is the only one to see obviously. As the event brings him back to reality, he sees now Viktoria dressed in a bright and splendid Muenchener Kindl costume.
After this event, Niklas will be able to peak in the penumbra for a few minutes if he tries to see beyond.

*Brunhilde* can only be seen by awaken spirits:
* Garous/Kinfolks with gnosis score. * Kindreds with Auspex 3. * Mage with Spirit/Arete 1.

The players at this time should had contacted the Police due to what they witnessed during the night. If they didn't, the Police will come to them. Detective Stravinstki is the one responsible of the situation. Two guys will be there however, one from the secret services and one from the MAD. A third character, the psychanalist Louisa Shermann will be there to assist the witnesses if they feel ill at ease.
Where the bad guys send their first kindred to Oktoberfest to see if the magic works.
After identification of the events in Hopfbraü Tent as a Sabbat attack, council of the Elder is called upon by Princess Ursula.
Sabbat implication in the events during the Wiesn make no doubt. The Prince decides there must be consequences.

Forces are gathered to act against the infection:
1. Nosferatud of the Underworld will roam the outer neighborhood of Munich take actions against every Sabbat insurgent. They are commanded no to interact if lupines are involved. 1. In the Wiesn, **Ludmilla Obermann** has obtained Carte Blanche to do the same, with the support of **Konrad Heisen** and **Erik Wiener**.

There are many strange things happening this year in Munich during the Oktoberfest. There’s a new Prince in the City since the 90’s, Princess Ursula. With her arrival, a more conservative stance has been adopted that has stopped the development of kindreds in the City, but fortified their positions, especially against the sabbat raging through Austria. So far, the Munich Camarilla has been easily able to endure the direct assaults from the austrian Swords of Caine while maintaining the Masquerade. One thing in particular is the peak in criminal activities among a lot of local drug cartels. In the shadows, the Princess of Munich suspects a group of Sabbat packs coming from Austria. She has yet no proof but she is right, the Swords of Bishop Tiberius, an old vampire of lasombra clan, have come to Munich to set a terrible plan for September 28. Not aware of exactly what the Sabbat is planning, the Princess of Munich as asked the Camarilla kindred to prepare for the worse, sending wartime cotteries all around the City and keeping the sheriff, Ludmilla Delatour, a powerful venture especially on the coverage of Oktoberfest. She will of course be there every nights, keeping her most efficient ghouls (Piotr Stravinski in particular) during daylight. On sunday 22, Ludmilla will be aware that something happened to the bus to Innsbruck, and by night she will send two of her coterie deputies, Konrad Heisen (Toreador) and Erik Wiener (Malkavian) to get more informations.

The nosferatu of the underworld, answering to the Elder Bismark had eye witnesses of the Swords operation on the road to Innsbruck. The Primogen Council has been gathered. Ursula Eidenstadt has become Prince of Munich following the actions of the Sabbat on the City thirty years ago. Some, among the Toreador, Brujah and the Tremere would gladly let her meet the final death if for whatever reason proof was given she worked with the Sabbat to obtain such a promotion.
The Toreador and Brujah have lost their primogens and other elders during the fight, and the tremere are the ones who really had contacts with the sabbat, such a situation is than understandable.
And the first to understand that is Ursula. She genuinely hates the sabbat, but she spent even more resources on this witch hunt to prove herself legit has the Prince of Munich.
Ludmilla Obermann, and Elder Ventrue has been chosen to watch sabbat activity during Oktoberfest. This is not a replacement to what is actually done every year, but a reinforcement.

* Later, Paola Bommer, the ninth shovelhead will rise from the site, afraid and scared. She will feed on two innocent bystanders, **Dominic Shaun** and **Rafik Tamahar**, two technicians working on the site at night to fix power issues for the village of **Landberg am Lech**. She is key to `[Sc:0031]`
Blood Shopping At The Bus Stop
The even happen at 4:30 AM. The bus goes from Innsbruck Südbahnstraße to Munich Central Bus Station. It's a FlixBus. It's supposed to arrive at 6:15 AM. The trip is 13.99€ with VAT

There are 44 passengers in the bus and 1 driver. One of the sabbat, *Alphone*, will use presence to captivatye all the people in the bus while *Lazarino* and *Natasha* will use Dominate to fix the most reluctants.
All we be chained and the strongest beaten almost to death by *Pomede*. *Christophe* will then lead them to the Rendez-vous point B.

##### The nine victims 1. **Brigid Strauss** the waitress that is missing among the staff of Hopfbrau tent. 1. **Joseph Vaughn**, austrian student 1. **Roberto Brella**, retired, comes to see his grandson 1. **Nico Talulla**, female, classical musician 1. **Omar Dremmel**, male, construction worker in Munich 1. **Kristof Landsmann** austrian tourists going to oktoberfest 1. **Erica Landsmann** 1. **Lucius Marksen**, journalist 1. **Paola Bommer**. She will rise later and the sabbat will neglect this issue.

Where the first nine shovelheads to be are separated from the other. The Sabbat plans for having loss, they will need 7 shovel heads so 2 people are added to the bloodlust. Safety first.
The victims are led south of **Landberg am Lech**, close to a wildlife preservation park. The blood fest takes an hour and all 9 corpses are buried 6 feet deep.
Two humans have been dominated by Natasha Remco to use a Catterpillar 304CR digger to prepare the burial site.

Later, Paola Bommer, the ninth shovelhead will rise from the site, afraid and scared. She will feed on two innocent bystanders, **Dominic Shaun** and **Rafik Tamahar**, two technicians working on the site at night to fix power issues for the village of **Landberg am Lech**.
The technicians were lurking around the burial site, looking for their digger when they faced Paola.

Introducing Vidar Grímsdóttir, a former melter worker in small security jobs here and there, trying to find a way to start a decent career in a decent activity. Among the few friends of Vidar, there is Rina Poulsen, with which he has almost a sibling relationship. He went to germany following her.

This year, Vidar is Security Contact Officer for Oktoberfest. It's a double pay job, but with much more responsibility and much more meetings. This is the first of them, where he got breifed about everything a security manager must now. It's a 3 hours meeting with 20 guys attending. Each guy will have 3 to 8 people working with him. Vidar learns about the missing waitress, a girl named Brigid Strauss, presented as Miss B. Strauss.
The SCO, about 30 guys, are introduced to Detective Karl Steiner, the guy in charge from the Lander police. Once again, he hopes he will be useless, but he cares about drug activites and wants the SCO to keep both eyes opened on the subject. Fabio Fenzi, an italian maffioso is known to operate in the sector since a few monthes, and he wants to keep Fenzi guys out of the game. Steiner introduce his assistant on the matter from the italian DIS, Federica Marzzi.
Piotr Stravinski is present during this meeting but is not introduced. It appears anyway has a field detective, and not the kind of guy to mess with.

Few time later, Brunhilde comes to Vidar to say that she is late. She could be mistaken for Brigid, but she will specify she is not the other girl. After all, has only Vidar can see her, it will be complicated to ask guidance to someone else about her.
Working as an SCO gives a lot of responsibility, but a lot of means are put it the hand of the guys (contact with the Police, Walkie-Talkie...)

As a ghoul of the Prince, Stravinski is her eyes and ears at daytime. A couple centuries old, most shovelheads or sabbat neonates should not be a threat to him. He is among the few characters in the story that has, as a complement to the standard GSG9 ordinance (the German SWAT) a 1943 .45 English revolver loaded with plain silver bullets. He can be a good ally in fight against supernatural creatures)
This is for you Mrs Bommer
At Mr and Mrs Bommer house

The missing neighbourgh, Mrs Paola Bommer was among the passengers of the Innsbruck Bus. She has been turned into a shovelhead by the sabbat pack. She managed to escape them (she was a late riser), and, freaked out and disoriented, she tried to go back to familiar grounds.... and came back home to see her beloved husband.
Avoid Paola killing to many innocent people. Avoid her getting killed.
A member of the company of Leopold will see the cooperation with a demon a line that cannot be crossed.
Mrs Bommer, if it is possible to calm a thurst for human blood, might willingly cooperate. She knows where she has been killed and remembers who did that. She doesn't know the names exactly, but
Mr Bommer or the Tilmanns could be killed if the PC do not intervene.

##### Motives **Tiberius** has found a new way to claim territories for the Sabbat in the old world. To avoid the clumsiness of Sabbat activities, he decided to run this himself from Venezzia, using allies outside the kindred factions, a subsidiary company of Pentex called NEA (New Enterprises Association, owner of MasterClass, DataRobot, CollectiveHealth (linked to Pfizer via a board of director member, Scott Gottlieb), Uber, Twitter). NEA, among the myriad of new enterprises it sponsors, has a brand new brewery in Munich, called **Blasensaftbrauerei**. This firm, lead by a deviant formor called **Rudi Blauerschnee** is protected for the occasion by a pack of black spiral dancers, the Pentacle.
##### The Plan Blauerschnee and Tiberius are old acquaintances, and the plan they are about to brew is one they had a long time ago designed: to propagate the taste of vampire blood through a beverage, using a spiritual vector in the water to have the diluted solution effect preserved inside an important batch.
The gain for NEA is to be the only provider of the recipe, directly from Munich, acting has a strong actor among the defiler Wyrm minions.

A lot of vampire blood is necessary, the amount of seven neonate vampires, to make a batch. It can hence be done with shovelheads, has the generation does not seem to alter the recipe, just the fact it is the total blood from seven different souls.
##### Ingredients * A base beverage (wine, water, beer, juice, but not liquid coming from animals, no blood, no sweat ) * Blood from seven kindreds * An Alkaharol Wyrmling (the Incarna of Addiction must be invoked) * The recipe Even if the blood is part of the recipe, this is not the main vector of the potion: it will help to invoke the an avatar of **Alkarahol, the Incarna of Addiction**, a powerful Defiler Wyrm spirit which is then fused in the batch like a spirit can be caught inside an object to make a fetish.
If none of the batch has been drink in 7 days, the power of the batch disappear. It will disappear anyway 7 weeks after the drinking of the first bottle. The proportion of vampire blood must absolutely be respected and must not be mixed with watever other blood, or it will create a perverse version of the product: not a drink that gives the drinker the desire to drink vampire blood, but only the state when craving for vampire blood: fever, stomach troubles, headaches, trouble breathing. The trouble is that this curse can be transmitted by touch an by breath contact.

Among the shovelheads made to prepare the first batch, 8 will rise normally. Seven of them will feed on the last one, and will be conducted to Blasensaft Braüerei.
Later, Paola Bommer, the ninth shovelhead will rise from the site, afraid and scared. She will feed on two innocent bystanders, **Dominic Shaun** and **Rafik Tamahar**, two technicians working on the site at night to fix power issues for the village of **Landberg am Lech**.
The garou nation obtains the deal with the preceptor...
From A Cricket Point Of View...
Marcy has an old recipe that she call her Irisish Aunty Verbal Tea. Really efficient against fever.
The activists of the AfD (Alternativ für Deutschland), right wing neonazi extremists are the diversion put there by the Sabbat to keep people busy (the Camarilla in particular).
Wreck havoc and do maximum damage.

The Camarilla is ready for that. It will not intervene in an instant, but after 15 minutes the Nosferatu of the Underworld will be there to take care of those petty humans. They will be supported by a GSG9 team. It's important to notice that the guns used by the nosferatus are the same ordinance that the ones used by the GSG9 cops.
This timeline introduces a mystic guy that will join the player during the first part of Oktoberfest (until the Reveal Scene).

It’s the inquisition that will bring the PC together, represented by a member of the Society of Leopold, **Otto Werner**. Werner is responsible for the occult activities in Munich, and he is a man prepared… to fight Vampires. The two agents from the BND and the MAD present are two allies of his and constitute an quite effective backup. For him to get involved with the PC, it only takes them to witness something about the vampires and it should be enough. Having specific orders to be very stealthy in its activities, he will try whatever he can to have people witnessing strange things interogated and mislead to avoid rumors to spread. During his mission, he will find vampires as he espects; but sabbat kindreds, the local Camarilla being already aware of his activities. His primary target is Nestor. He had contacts with Society in Bergamo where the Brujah Antitribu already had issues with local maffia gangs. He has proofs on a digital crypted 256Gb SD card (a copy of the original kept by the Society) in his vault at Digi-Key Gmbh.
